caption:
The photograph features a man in a work environment. He appears to be middle-aged with a square jaw, wearing a silver hard hat labeled with the number "2". He's dressed in a long-sleeve, plaid, button-up shirt in tones of red and white, and faded blue denim jeans. His outfit is completed with a dark brown belt and what looks like a set of work gloves. He's holding onto a thick rope, connected to a large metal box which appears to be slightly rusted and worn, indicating it might be a piece of heavy equipment or machinery used in his work.

The man is standing in front of what looks like a section of a large vehicle or machinery, which has a shiny black surface and is rich in complex metallic parts, suggesting an industrial setting. His posture and facial expression imply readiness and attentiveness, possibly taking a short break from his tasks or preparing to move the metal box.

The background is out of focus, providing all attention to the worker and his immediate surroundings. The setting suggests a bright sunny day, given the harsh shadows and bright lighting in the image. This element, along with the man's gear, underlines the outdoor, hands-on nature of his occupation.
title: Working on 6th avenue west development in west Denver (jefferson county)
